long_description: Constructed out of bamboo, these Planet Bike Grasshopper fenders offer excellent coverage with natural style. 3-ply Moso bamboo laminate construction is protected with a durable, marine-grade finish to ensure lasting use. Release tabs on front fender stays allow front fender to automatically release if something gets caught between the tire and fender. Quick-adjust, stainless-steel hardware is pre-installed for hassle-free mounting. V-stays supply additional stability. 45mm width fits tires up to 27 x 1-1/4 in. or 700c x 35mm.
short_description: Constructed out of bamboo, these Planet Bike Grasshopper fenders offer excellent coverage with natural style.
